attributes.description:
Finance Is Available With All The Major Banks As We Are Approved Dealers. Please Come And Visit Our Used Car Manager And Our Business Manager
They Will Be Able To Arrange A Taylor Made Deal Structure To Match Your Pocket Over A Lovely Cup Of Coffee At Our Bistro. Trade-ins Welcome And We Pay Top Prices For Good Clean Vehicles. First Time To Finance
Our Finance And Insurance Manager Will Assist You Step By Step Throughout Your Process. There Are Great Warranty Options Available For This Vehicle And Other Great Products. Should You Require Further Information Or You Would Like To Arrange A Test Drive Please Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us At Motus Toyota Strijdom Park.

attributes.description:
A surprisingly roomy interior that comfortably seats 5 is complemented by a host of convenient features like powered windows, aircon ,12v sockets , . the adaptable ergonomic seats with bolster support offer superior comfort and a high driving position for better visibility. 

Passive and active safety features include pro-sense seat belts, dual airbags, reverse parking sensors, abs+ ebd ,central locking system ,refined rear axle and 14 inch wheels for better road holding giving you the assurance of safer driving throughout your journey       
 With reverse camera, you can manoeuvre into any parking space with ease. the added benefit of static-guidelines provides added peace of mind.

attributes.description:
If the city makes you feel young and alive, and you're eager to explore new places, you've found a
soulmate in the new Picanto. Compact on the outside, roomy on the inside, and full of big ideas.
With its dynamic performance and agile manoeuvrability, the Picanto turns a neighbourhood into
its very own playground.
Vehicle comes with complementary smash& grab.


Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description: Only two responsible owners since new. TOP OF THE RANGE ELEGANCE SPEC This cannot be compared to the 100s of ex rental trends or comfort ballades currently available on the market. This vehicle has been perfectly looked after by a fanatical previous owner who has always looked after it with pride and love. ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS CONDITION Titanium silver Metallic, Upholstery is like new and finished with Satin Silver Trim. FULLY LOADED WITH ALL THE EXTRAS AND LUXURIES INCLUDING Multi Functional Sports Leather steering, Cruise Control, USB Interface, HONDA BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY PACKAGE, Height adjustable seats, electric mirrors, Beautiful 15 inch Elegance light Alloy wheels etc. etc. immaculate and perfect in every way, must be seen to be appreciated Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit prefitted for your safety and security. AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE

attributes.description: one Lady owner since new, Very Special Car, LOOKS FEELS AND DRIVES LIKE A BRAND NEW CAR 20 OUT OF 10 VEHICLE, ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS CONDITION, PERFECTLY ORIGINAL AND IMMACULATE IN EVERY WAY FULL SERVICE HISTORY WITH KIA, every single service completed on schedule and up to date INCLUDING SERVICE RECENTLY COMPLETED AT KIA I know the previous owner of this vehicle personally, they always treated their family vehicle with love and respect, ALWAYS GARAGE PARKED Alpine White, Grey Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Satin Silver Trim. Fully Loaded with every extra and luxury including Full Leather Package, Luxury Electric Memory Seat Package, Dual Zone Climate Control, Tow Bar, Park Distance Control, AUTOMATIC ELECTRIC DOORS AND BOOT Electric Folding Mirrors, AUTO ARMOR SMASH AND GRAB SAFETY FILM etc etc Perfectly looked after and maintained. 4 TYRES ARE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION Amazing 2.9 Diesel engine offers brilliant power, CRAZY LIGHT ON DIESEL. If you are looking for a luxury automatic people carrier with low mileage and COMPREHENSIVE SERVICE HISTORY then you simply cannot find a cleaner or better value vehicle than this one STAND HEAD AND SHOULDERS ABOVE THE REST must be seen and driven to be appreciated Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit prefitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
